fields.name: Features:
fields.value:
- At least one Black member, one White member, and one Chromatic member must spawn.
- No factional chat. Members know each others' identities.
- Factional transfur (Attempt to convert a player to a random Latex role of the same subalignment as the user)
- At the beginning of the game, each player is assigned a secret random willpower value between 50% and 85%, minus 5% for each stage of attack or defense that player has up to Overkill/Overprotective. If the factional transfur is used on that player, this is the chance that the conversion is successful.
- The factional transfur can be blocked by all protective effects.
- If a member attacks someone and fails, they have a 25% chance to transfur them.
- May not kill until after Night 2.
- Limit of only one kill-capable role per game.
